sentences.sContent: The scale of this map is one centimeter to the kilometer.
sentences.sContent_eng: The scale of this map is one centimeter to the kilometer.
sentences.sCn: 这个地图的比例是用一厘米代表一公里。

sentences.sContent: Life finds a way. It seems wherever we look, microbes are there, whether high in the sky or more than a kilometer deep underground.
sentences.sContent_eng: Life finds a way. It seems wherever we look, microbes are there, whether high in the sky or more than a kilometer deep underground.
sentences.sCn: 生命自有其法。在我们所能观察到的所有地方，无论是高空中还是地下一千米深处似乎都有微生物的身影。
